segments.text: Oh , you can rest assured that they'll be no problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your upstairs neighbors live in Canada and rarely come back to Taiwan . When they do , they're never home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Two flight attendants that are also in and out of town . When they're here , they're usually sleeping . And next door to you is me . I'm a quiet neighbor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds ideal . We'll get back to you in a couple of days then .
segments.speaker: S2
